name: Zandalarian Shadow Mastery Talisman
tooltip:
Zandalarian Shadow Mastery TalismanLevel 60

It yearns to grow, <name>. The talisman has soaked in all that you have done. The thousands of troll corpses littering Zul'Gurub have fueled its power. Hand it to me and I shall make the final enhancement.

Requirements:
- Zandalarian Shadow Talisman
